thread.title: Find your AA flight time and gate
thread.title_full: Find your AA flight time and gate

title: Find your AA flight time and gate
text:
Expert Videos American Airlines 
If you’re traveling on American Airlines, or planning on picking someone up from an American Airlines flight, there’s a good chance you’ll need to know which gate the plane’s leaving from, and if it’s on time. 
The easiest way to do this is by consulting American Airlines Gates and Times webpage . 
Simply put in your flight number and/or the destination and origin cities and the date and time. 
It will return a nice set of results, listing the flight numbers, departure and arrival times, delay, gates, and baggage areas (if available). Related Articles
